name: Ultimate Animation Game Souls Fighting Revenge
name_original: Ultimate Animation Game Souls Fighting Revenge
description:
Immerse yourself in the animated world and accept the challenge! Fight with characters from the universes:Sonic the Hedgehog, Super Mario Bros, "Street Fighter, Ojamajo Doremi, Dragon Ball and others.

I remind you that this game is fully completed, but unfortunately we had a problem adding music, you can add your own music for the levels at your discretion.

If you want to play the rest of the characters or don’t like the bad, link to the Censored version:https://yadi.sk/d/Z4Mc_GYPI5rSOw
